note.p: English-born American microscopist and journalist. Member of the Quekett Microscopical Club, 1870. Emigrated to the United States in 1871; became an American citizen in 1886. Founder of Science; editor, 1880–2. Member of the American Society of Microscopists, 1891–4. Chief microscopist, Bureau of Animal Industry, Chicago, by 1891.
Journal of the Quekett Microscopical Club 2 (1870): 89
Proceedings of the American Society of Microscopists 13 (1891): 59, 216 and 15 (1894): 254
